nodes.text: Dowut was a frigid planet of windswept tundras located in a trinary star system in the Core Worlds of the galaxy, near the Unknown Regions, and was the homeworld of the Dowutin species. Dowut was also home to predatory gor-cats and nabirs which were known to kill members of the Dowutin precursor species. Despite Dowut having joined the Galactic Republic, the Dowutin generally avoided politics and their senator made appearances on Coruscant sparingly. At the time of the Galactic Empire, Dowut suffered from an indefinite Imperial blockade.
